dataset_id: BOREAS AFM-03 Electra 1994 Aircraft Flux and Moving Window Data
title: BOREAS AFM-03 Electra 1994 Aircraft Flux and Moving Window Data
summary: Measurements of the fluxes of momentum, sensible and latent heat, carbon dioxide, and ozone over the entire BOREAS region to tie together measurements made in both the SSA and the NSA.
